Room.Name: East Side of Stump
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of a great forest stump.
Room.LongDescription: The path circles around the massive stump to the north and to the south. High on the remains of the ancient tree that once stood her you can see where someone has carved something, perhaps a message, or perhaps just graffiti. A prickly hedge on the east side of the path requires you to stay close to the tree stump as you follow the path.
